input.sentences: the family walked around and looked at the buildings .
they stopped and posed for pictures before going forward on their journey
they saw a lake and decided to take a closer look
they walked over the bridge to get a closer look at the ducks
they ended their day with a game at the park . overall it was a fun day
output.sentences: My family and I took a lovely walk and looked at all the sights
My husband made sure I stopped to take plenty of pictures of him.
We came across a lake and decided to to take a closer look.
When we got closer we noticed there was a whole family of ducks.
Next to the lake was a park that we decided to play a game of soccer that was so much fun!
